overview: One day, Yoshii, who follows a woman who molested him on a train and commits a break-in robbery, meets Yuriko, who is living in seclusion while enduring severe domestic violence from her husband, and the two are drawn to each other. The two eventually connect and find peace, but an unfortunate incident and a connection to a crime Yoshii committed in the past throws the wheels out of gear.
title: Wanted: For Forced Entry
